item.title: Simple RSC Fishing Script Help Please
item.dc:creator: @traxal traxal
item.description:
@traxal wrote:

So this is like a really lame fisher but it is effective. I just need to add a sleeping procedure ive added a little bit of information about it below…

So when you get tired green (65280) writing comes up in the chat text area (87:593)…

Then all that needs to happen is click on sleeping bad in inventory. So hover mouse over inventory bag (751:40)

Then click on the sleeping bag (541:76)

Thats it.

So ill try and put it into more understandable terms:

when (sleep text color) is found in (xy)
then
movemouse (inventory bag co ords)
then
clickmouse (sleeping bag co ords)

I think it should be very simple! But I admit i am very nooby!

So here is the script as it stands:

[code]/////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
// Simple Power Fisher
// By: Traxal
//
//
//
//This script is for Runescape CLASSIC
/////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

var

i,x,y: Integer;

const

/////////////////////////Setup\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//
FishColor1 =23552; {Sparkle Color} //
FishColor2 =23552; {Sparkle Color} //
FishColor3 =23552; {Sparkle Color} //
Fish =1000000; {How many fish to catch} //
////////////////////////EndSetup\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

begin
repeat
i:= i + 1
if (FindColorSpiral(x,y,MonsterColor1,361,210,473,341))
or (FindColorSpiral(x,y,MonsterColor2,193,139,559,430))
or (FindColorSpiral(x,y,MonsterColor3,4,27,761,608)) then
begin
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x,y +random(0),20,40,45,25,20);
Wait(123+random(10));
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
wait(2000); {how many second you want to wait between each click}
end;
until i = MonsterKillCount
end.[/code]

Read full topic
